headline: Norway dumps stake in Caterpillar over West Bank links
summary: Norway’s wealth fund has dumped its £1.8bn holding in Caterpillar over concerns Israel is destroying Palestinian homes with its bulldozers.

raw.headline: Norway dumps stake in Caterpillar over West Bank links
raw.summary: Norway’s wealth fund has dumped its £1.8bn holding in Caterpillar over concerns Israel is destroying Palestinian homes with its bulldozers.

headline: Norwegian Wealth Fund Ditches Caterpillar Over Israel’s Bulldozer Use
summary: An independent body recommended the move as it said the company’s bulldozers were being used by Israel to destroy Palestinian homes.

raw.headline: Norwegian Wealth Fund Ditches Caterpillar Over Israel’s Bulldozer Use

headline: Norway wealth fund divests from Caterpillar over Gaza 'rights violations'
summary: Norway's sovereign wealth fund said Monday that it had divested from US construction equipment firm Caterpillar over purported involvement in rights violations in the Israel-Hamas war.The fund said it had also withdrawn from five Israeli firms for financing the construction of illegal settlements in the Israel-occupied West Bank.
